content.detailedDescription:
I was driving east on the us 60 freeway heading to work and observed what looked like a black cylinder in the morning sky. it looked really odd as there were no clouds in the sky and the light from the sun which hadn't rising yet was illuminating the sky behind it.. i watched it for a few minutes and then it started to slowly dissipate and shrink in size until it was completely gone. as soon as it was gone another one started to appear and grow just to the left of where the original one was. then after about another 30 seconds 2 more started to appear. they seemed to appear and grow in size. i drove a few miles past where my work was to try and get a better look. when i got off the freeway i lost site until i cleared some houses and there was only one left in the sky. it appeared to be a dark cloud that looked like smoke. it was black and hovered for about 10 minutes before it started to dissipate. i took some pictures and video and there is not a single cloud or anything else in the sky. after a few minutes i drove back a few miles to work when i noticed about 50 miles north east from where the original sitings were there were 2 dark cylinder shapes in the sky in that direction one hovering over the other. i also took some pictures and video of those but they were a lot further away. 

the objects looked like burnt clouds or smoke and what really was weird was how fast the vanished and reappeared. i have never seen anything like that before. it looked very unnatural.
content.summary: Black cloud cylinder shape

content.detailedDescription: Went outdoors to view night sky (nearly full moon), looked to south-southeast, saw orange lights, in roughly triangular shape, very bright, brighter than the visible stars.  they appeared stationary for several minutes, then the 3 farthest south blinked out; 6 stayed lit and stationary.  next 3 (middle 3 from my perspective) blinked out, and finally the 2 farthest north from my perspective blinked out, approximately 10 seconds later.   i continued to watch a few minutes, but they did not reappear.  a small plane crossed "in front" of them while 5 were visible, but impossible to estimate distance from plane to objects.  small planes not unusual in this area and the anomaly did not appear associated with the plane, nor did the plane appear to react, change course, etc.  no clue what this was, nor how long it was in place.  i had just stepped outside, scanned to my left, and saw the lights.
content.summary: 8 orange lights in roughly triangle formation stationary in the south-southeast night sky, very bright despite moon (brighter than stars) which faded, 3 at base of triangle, then middle three, then leading 2.

content.detailedDescription:
Soy turista en chicago y me encuentro con mi hijo de 11 anos en el piso 24 del hotel hyatt regency mccormick. mi hijo, mirando por la ventana, me dice 'mira papa un globo !'. voy a ver y el 'globo' no se mueve como tal. sigue la costa en direcciã³n del planetarium mas rapido que los coches de la carretera paralela al litoral (+100km/h). yo veo que no puede ser un globo, pues va demasiado recto y rã¡pido en su trayectoria, ademas es demasiado grande (mas de 1.5 m). tomo la cã¡mara (canon powershot a710is) y al llegar a la ventana veo que esta cambiando de direcciã³n : en lugar de seguir la costa cambia y se va rumbo al lago. hago una sola foto con el zoom y, muy cerca de una especie de 'faro', el cual puede servir de referencia para conocer su altitud, que nunca cambio, y su talla, lo pierdo de vista. con la distancia perdã­ la nitidez de visiã³n.
la esfera, o huevo, parecia solida. mi mujer, cuando se lo contã©, hablaba de un 'dron'. no era ni un avion, ni un helicã³ptero y tampoco un dron : no tenia ni helices, ni luces, ni le salia humo por ningun sitio. he volando mas de 100 veces en aviones comerciales y soy piloto de planeador : era algo sorprendente que nunca habã­a visto antes. lo mas parecido a algo conocido seria una sonda.
content.summary: Una esfera, posiblemente en forma de huevo, rojiza. que vuela a 200 m del suelo en linea recta sobre la costa y, de repente, cambia de direcciã³n y se dirige hacia el mar.

content.detailedDescription:
november 1st, 2014: 

my neighbor and i were outside standing next to a burn barrel getting warm and visiting.  it was dark out at this time.

for whatever reason, i looked up in the sky and noticed two stars in the sky that were in the east.  i also noticed at this time that one was a lot brighter than the other one.  i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me so i watched them for several seconds and noticed that they appeared to be moving across the sky, in a western direction, and at a steady pace. i told my neighbor to check out those crazy stars because they looked odd to me. 

he looked up into their direction and finally found them.   they sped up a little so at that point it was obvious that they were actually moving. he then stated that he didn't think they were stars.


at that time, the one in front, which was quite a bit dimmer than the really bright one, jerked forward three times then took off so fast that it disappeared from sight in about a second. within a second or two, the brighter one shot off into the same direction heading north and they were gone from sight. 

we both felt we had seen a ufo and called the non emergency police number for our area.   we told the lady on the phone what we had seen just incase someone else saw it too.
content.summary: Observed two bright lights moving across in the sky.    the dimmer one jerked forward 3 times then took off at a very fast speed followed by the second one.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufos oct 31, 2014 
driving north on spruce toward euclid. san francisco ca
time approx. 8:30-8:45 pm
i see the sky in front of me filled with orange-red fireballs with tails. 
they are moving like a flock of phoenix from west toward east with a slight northerly direction. the individual orange fireballs moved like a flock of migrating birds. 
i stop the car and get out with my iphone. the phone at first won’t turn on. then i can not access the camera. when i click on the camera it automatically returned to my home screen or went white. all this time—the fireballs keep moving from west to east—disappearing into what appeared like twilight fog. i was finally able to take 7 pictures.
 3 of the pictures in sequence demonstrate the patterns and movement of the objects together . i was only able to photograph the end of the group. when large numbers were passing my iphone would not take pictures. 
in addition i attempted to take video. of my 2 attempts—upon review they only lasted 1 and 7 seconds. i wonder how they appeared to me like huge balls of fire just a half a city-block away--but when photographed they look like stars in the distance.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fireballs fill san francisco night sky moving from west upward northeast

content.detailedDescription:
Me & my daughter were sitting on the front deck of our home, when i witnessed a bright glowing orb in the se portion of the sky slowly projecting nw. suddenly the ufo shot straight up into the sky and vanished. shortly afterwards,"10 to 15 minutes" me, my spouse and daughter
were driving to salida, when we witnessed a governmental plane flying at a high rate of speed within the mountainous area at a lower than normal altitude. this plane seemed to vanish before colliding with the mountainous area.

this might sound bogus, however, this is what we witnessed and it is somewhat puzzling, as to why the governmental plane arrived following our observation of this ufo.

we did not have adequate time to photograph or video this ufo due to the shortness of time, prior to the ufo's departure.
content.summary: Following observation a military plane flew past at low altitude & high speed then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Was caught on deer camera had spooked all deer away then appeared
content.summary: Was caught on deer camera

content.detailedDescription:
I am in coeur d'alene, idaho.

son was leaving my house via front door, which aims east, about 7 pm nov. 2.  he yelled for me to come outside.  when i did, he pointed into the dark, but clear sky.  we saw 5 balls of bright light not moving.  guess was altitude of 2500 to 5,000 feet, not anywhere near flight path.  no sound or vibrations. 

i looked through binoculars and saw only bright round lights in circle.

the top most light manuvered to the bottom of the circle, while the other 4 moved so as to form a y.  we still did not detect any motion, either forward, upward or otherwise.

at once, the top two moved at instant speed, ne and dissapeared.  the next two followed same trajectory, leaving only the bottom light still stationary and visible.

then bottom light took off same way and dissapeared.

i've not seen anything resembling since.
content.summary: 5 lite balls in circle, then formed y, then left 1 by 1

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog in the park when i saw a shiny triangular shaped object descending to the trees, when it got to the top of  the treetops, it hovered there stationary for about 15 seconds and then it flashed once and took off straight up in the air. after about 2 minutes i heard helicopter blades, but i did not actually see the helocopter, but i knew what i heard, it was there. when i got home i told my roommate about the incident, but he didn't believe me until i showed him the picture i took. i found this website and posted this, somebody please tell me what i have seen. i know what i saw and i would like the truth. thank you1
content.summary: I was walking my dog in the park, and i saw a shiny reflective triangle shaped object come down to the trees aprox. 500 feet from me. it hovered there for about 15 seconds and flashed once, then it went straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
I live close to logan airport boston ma 130am went outside to smoke cig about 3 miles away seen very bright light in sky i thought plane landing airport but to high sky moving slow i watched light fo r about 4min then light speed up over my apt building 5-7 seconds 
 old never seen something like this before thankyou
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright lastght

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were out for a walk in se missouri and i looked to the se and through a clearing in the trees i seen 3 lights in a diagonal line, we stopped and watched them for a few minutes then 2 more appeared out of nowhere. we ran home and got into the truck and headed in their direction. my son has an app on his phone that shows any aircraft in the area yet nothing was showing up so we knew it couldn't be planes or copters. we followed them for 30 miles or so but they would speed up then slow down we were not able to get really close even though we were traveling at 80 + miles an hour, we could make out that they were triangle shaped and the lights we seen were bright white and an orange glow. they flew in a line a various heights by this time there were 7 of them. 1 or 2 of them would break away and fly left or right of the line that was continuing to fly straight then they would regroup,by this time we were in ne arkansas! it was between 11:15pm and 1 am. we parked on hwy 77 near leachville arkansas and watched them go out of sight we waited for about 15 mins. then decided to leave and while i was headed homed i could see the lights in my mirrors they were coming our direction so i stopped in the middle of the road turned my lights out and they came close then went back the other way, we figured out we were never going to get close enough and continued home i could still see them at 1 am. i have never seen anything like this before in my life i am 44. we aren't sure of what we saw but we do know it wasn't planes,weather balloons,helicopters or paper lanterns.They were triangular in shape we could make that out about them. i haven't told anyone other than my family because people are judgmental but i assure you we aren't crazy.
content.summary: While on a walk we witnessed 7 lighted objects in the sky, we tried to follow in car

content.detailedDescription:
Witness at work, stationary in vehicle, lights off, engine running and facing south at the edge of the bolinas lagoon.  first observed due to bright lights catching attention from the east, near the edge of the lagoon nearest shoreline highway 1 (4000 block), no obstructions and about 1 mile away. bright white light to the front and bright red to the rear.  lights projected in opposite directions, on same level and in tandem.  at least 75 feet space between the set of lights.  lights traveled westbound at high rate of speed over the bolinas lagoon and with only by a few feet of elevation. lights continued westbound until losing sight due to a hill.  appeared to continue towards open sea, south of the town of bolinas.

witness positive not a airplane/helicopter and based on distance traveled when observed, too fast for a boat.  lights were out of sight within seconds.  confirmed no roadways in listed area to possibly confuse with any common type vehicle.

when first observed, witness verbally and with excitement yelled, "what the hell is that!" then jumped from his vehicle and ran to the direct edge of the water to keep the lights in sight.  witness immediately drove to ocean  overlook but lights were not seen again. 

sketch can be provided if requested.
content.summary: Zoomed, on the deck, over lagoon, headed to open sea, too fast for a boat, not a plane/helicopter. very bright lights,

content.detailedDescription: I was heading northwest on cedar shoals dr. when i came to a stop at the red traffic light on the intersection of cedar shoals dr., barnett shoals rd., and gaines school rd. i noticed two large, very bright white lights moving at a slow pace moving from west to east directly over the intersection. at first i thought that it was a small plane coming or going from the ben epps airport. however, as the object moved overhead i looked up and noticed that the lights were attached to what appeared to be a triangular craft with a dark gray frame (although it was difficult to make out any detail), no larger than a small car or go-kart, about 200 feet above the intersection. i then realized that what i was seeing looked nothing like a small plane. this sighting is very similar to a triangular craft of the same size and similar description that my husband and i witnessed a year ago very close to this location (same street, a few blocks down). i felt shocked that i was seeing what appeared to be the same triangular craft that i saw a year earlier. unfortunately, the traffic light turned green and i had to move through the intersection, at which point i lost sight of the craft. i glanced at the clock in my car and noticed that it was 8:00 pm.
content.summary: Small car-sized triangular craft with two bright white lights flies overhead

content.detailedDescription: Heading home on i-77 north at approximately 6:20 pm 11/03/2014, had just topped flat top mountain. extremely clear night, i observed 2 planes flying due east. as i was watching the planes, at a much lower altitude a light appeared and grew brighter and once it got to it's brightest, it sped east with no sound or trail behind it. this all happened in a span of 7 to 10 seconds. after it was gone the planes were still moving east also. not sure what it was i saw, but as soon as i walked in the house i asked my family if they heard a sonic boom or anything loud, they said they heard nothing nor saw anything from home.
content.summary: Saw 2 planes flying at high altitude, the object appeared below planes as a dim light then became larger in brightness and disappeared heading east with no trail behind it. very clear sky's.

content.detailedDescription: on sunday evening nov 2 2014 at 8:30 pm in vallejo ca i was outside taking out garbage cans and looked up at the northeastern sky and saw a very big orange sphere. it was a clear night. the object was hovering and about a quarter of the size of the moon that was in the southern sky and just as bright. object was yellow on the edges,sphere in shape, deep orange in color and the edges were blurry.I watched this for about 30 seconds and then went inside to tell my sister, it took about 10 seconds to get her and when i showed her the object she replied it's orange! we both watched it for about 15 seconds more then it blinked out. i thought it was moving so  i went into my driveway to get a better view and it was gone. while watching this object there was a plane in the eastern sky moving to the north. the plane was much higher in the sky and it had a good view to see the object? i've never seen anything like this before in my life! it was not a plane, blimp, falling star or comet. this was a ufo.
content.summary: I saw a big sphere-like object in the northeastern sky. orange in color with yellow edges.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving towards elkins on 92 after junior to stoplight that leads to 33 and i saw a blue bright sphere fly across the sky then quickly zip down towards mountains
content.summary: Driving and saw blue light in sky fly strait across then zag towards mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was just leaving work when i noticed a glowing orange orb appear out of the middle of the sky at around 10:30 p.M. and 11:00 p.M. it streaked across the sky at a hovering speed no faster than a plane, slowed down and than picked up its original speed. it was very reflective but you could easily tell it was not a plane. it was an orange orb glowing and flashing across the sky and eventually disappeared into the clouds. i have video proof of this event that had happened on my phone as well. the resolution came out quite well and i was even talking to a witness next to me who had also seen the ufo too.
content.summary: A spotted hovering ufo over bayonne, new jersey

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished eating dinner and i stepped out on the back porch. i saw three lights in the sky which i assumed were airplanes. suddenly, the middle light quickly descended and then vanished behind the cloud line. it was flashing just like the other two airplanes. afterwards, i quickly looked at the other two lights and they seemed to be cruising just like any other airplane.
content.summary: Flashing ufo quickly descended behind the clouds

content.detailedDescription: Was at brother in laws standing outside cause it was warmer than usual . it came through the sky so huge that it was impossible to miss and it was boomerang shaped and was on fire only the fire was green as if the whole thing was made of copper.. it was really spectacular but i fear if we do not act fast the government will try to cover it up like always. it never made a sound until it hit then it was as if someone blowed up.
content.summary: It was descending like a crash made no noise and was casting off green fire

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with two friends down front st n and me and my friend that was sitting in the passenger seat next to me while i was driving where just looking straight ahead and we were pointed towards squak mountain in issaquah and above the mountain we saw a really bright pretty large bluish bright white colored light just fall from th sky and level out and just disappeared into the distance . it was going so fast that it seemed to disappear right after it leveled out. it all happened in like one second. my friend and i both saw it but my friend in the back seat did not. it was really cool and you could just tell it was something extrodanary . you could just feel that it was alien. our windows were rolled all the way down as we were smoking a cigarette and there was no noise at all. it just went straight down really fast then leveled out and zipped off the direction we were pointed away from us. all going the same speed. it was going way toast to be an airplane or a drone. plus the g's from that leveling out it did was way to intense at that speed to be a manned aircraft.
content.summary: Driving down front st n , then saw bright bold light falling straight down from sky then leveled out and disappeared instantly going extremely fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was repairing the window on my dump truck and caught the object as it appeared over the pine tree in my back yard. looking as if it were over our pasture, it made a curve upwards then came down between the pine and cedar and disappeared into thin air. i first noticed the object because it was in my line of sight as i tried to line the mirror up before the glue dried. it was directly in my line of sight behind the mirror i was working on. i thought it was a falling star but i noticed the "tail" was not normal and that the entire object was the same amazing color that i've never seen before in the sky. it just appeared in my viewing window as i looked at the mirror, then i watched it make a sort of half loop up and then down, and disappear into thin air. i was completely amazed and in disbelief. i don't believe in ufo's. i really don't!! i still don't, until i find out for sure what this was anyway, my wife looked all over the internet to find something or someone who had something in the sky this morning, and found nothing so we decided to speak to you. the object just disappeared as easily as it appeared but after it made the half moon shaped path from mid sky upward then down, then disappeared.
content.summary: Seemed to follow a curve up from appearance and over then disappeared as fast as appeared. was a very beautiful engaging

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and her mother and i were driving home from rockport, texas.  i notice this light in my rear mirror that was changing different colors very bight then i pulled over to observe the lights.  all 3 of us were watching this thing go by very low then past us by over the horizon.  looked like a meteorite but it wasn't too many bright different colors.  a ball like with a tail.  flew low never did drop until it disappeared over the horizon.
when we got to austin our home we never talked about it till this weekend and we all wondered what the heck it was.  it was beautiful and all of us weren't scared when we saw it.  i always have my eyes on the skies while traveling.  wished i had taken pictures with my phone but i didn't want to take my eyes off of it because i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: It was so bright looked like a meteorite but it wasn't a lot of different colors bright blue, yellow green, turquoise long tail

content.detailedDescription: As i was getting ready to go to bed and turned off the lights i looked up into the sky out of my windows and saw an unusually bright object that seemed to change colors.  it was brighter and bigger than any planet or star, and after a few minutes of observation i realized it was moving.  it was fluttering and flashing different colored lights.  i have seen ufos before and this one was very similar to the one i saw when i was a teenager.  i went outside on my balcony and watched if for a while but i had to go to bed so i went back in.  i had a feeling it was going to be back, so next night about the same time i saw the same object, this time it was a little brighter and seemed a little closer to me.  i have a feeling i'm going to see it again tonight.  it appears right above tree line and it's right below the orion constellation.  it appears to be somewhere above border of south pasadena, san marino and alhambra.  i see helicopters and blimps flying by there sometimes, and i know that the object i am describing is neither of them, nor is it an airplane.
content.summary: Wobbling bright object with pulsating lights hovering, then slowly assanding

content.detailedDescription:
As i was sitting on my porch, with my friend. my friend first spotted one pulsing bright light moving across the sky, then at least 10 or 11 split off of it and they formed a triangular shape. i first thought it was fighter jets doing a fly by from an airshow or something, but they suddenly stopped in mid air, then hovered like the laws of gravity did not apply to it. after about 10-15 minutes it moved backwards. 
it took off like a flash, then moments later a black helicopter went the same direction.
content.summary: Sitting on my porch, saw a number of strange orb like lights moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: In october 2014, the daggett county sheriff received reports of cattle mutilations.
content.summary: Cattle mutilations

content.detailedDescription:
i know where to find, see, film and study a ufo any night of the week - all night long. as far as i know i am the only person on the planet or in the history of ufology that can make such a claim. 
     i have been tracking and studying a craft for the past five months that is in my area every night. i have filmed it from two different directions and by using triangulation methods i know exactly where it appears and where it goes.
     i first noticed the craft in june - 2014. it may have been around before that time but june - 2014 was when i first noticed it. i was at home and saw what looked like a very bright light about the size of a golf ball that i placed between 3 & 5 miles from me due east of my position about 50 degrees above the horizon. i have been watching the sky since i was a child and i am very aware of what airplane and helicopter lights look like as well as what stars and planets and other celestial objects (meteors, satellites, etc.) look like. i am also well versed in the sciences, especially astronomy and i have dabbled in quantum physics, so i recognized right away this was not a common light in the sky. the light this gave off was more like liquid meaning it shifted in colors from white to blue and green but not like conventional lights with pointed edges but more like liquid light that flowed from color change to color change.  it also has a small red light that sometimes moves around it in a figure 8 configuration. i watched it that first time move in a westerly direction after sitting in one spot for 20 minutes and then it disappeared behind the tree line on the top of the mountains. it moved no more than 50 mph or less. i thought this really strange and even stranger when it appeared in exactly the same spot i first noticed it 15 minutes later and it did the exact same thing it did the first time. it hovered for 20 minutes and then moved in a westerly direction again and disappeared behind the mountain tops. 15 minutes later it was back again a third time and did the same thing again. this went on all night long. of particular interest is that it does not seem to care who notices it. it does it`s thing on a nightly basis as if it has all the right in the world to be there. there seems to be no concern about concealment.
     once i noticed it i could not stop seeing it. it came the next night and the night after that. the only time since june (and this is october) that i have not seen it is when the fog rolls in as i live on the pacific coast.
     since then i have tracked it for the past 5 months and i know when it comes and where it will be at any time of the night. i can sell tickets and guarantee a sighting. i know this object so well i can tell you what it will do just by it`s color shift.
     i have filmed this craft up close and personal and it is like no other ufo i can find anywhere on the internet. for lack of words it looks like 3 very rough looking mountain peaks sitting on a guitar pick. that is exactly what it looks like and no other way to describe it. there are two parts to it with appendages that stick out of it at different angles. i will refer to the bottom part as the base. the base is triangular however that is not exactly right as the corners are rounded and not sharp edged. it looks 100% exactly like a guitar pick that is blacker than the night sky around it and that part of the craft is very smooth. 
     the top part looks like mountain peaks with large crevices between them that separate them. there are three of them but there may be another peak at the back that i cannot see. the tops of the peaks are curved or hooked - not pointed. the mountains are very rough looking and they are what light up on the ship. there are small lights that come on and go off around different parts of the craft but the mountains are the main light source. the mountain peaks shift in colors from white to rose to red to blue and green. i have noticed that when the craft shifts to red or rose it starts to move. when just sitting in one spot it tends to stay white in color or will shift colors such as blue and green but as mentioned when it gets ready to move it shifts to red.
     both the surfaces of the bottom and top parts of the craft have energy lines of some type that are continuously running across the surfaces. they almost look like tiny black lines moving along the surface. it is almost like the craft is coated in an energy field of some type and that is what is causing the lines on the surface. the energy lines increase and become more pronounced as the craft turns red or starts to move and are less pronounced when it is just sitting still.
     there is an appendage like a long pole that sticks out of the front. at the end of the pole is something that is identical in shape to the old style german potato masher hand grenades they used in wwii. there are red lights that go around the cylinder part and the handle part glows white. for what it`s worth the appendage was pointed right at me when i filmed it. to the side there is what looks like to be girders (like steel girders - however i am sure there is no steel on this craft) that stick out at 180 degrees. the girders have faint lights that come on and off and it is only when the girder lights come on that you can see the girders themselves.
     the closest i ever got to it and this is an estimate, is about 1/2 mile filming at 50 degrees above the horizon. using an inexpensive digital camera with a 12x zoom i got incredible detail. the videos i have shot of the craft are up close and personal. this is not a light in the sky shot from miles away - or something that one could argue must be a new type of military craft. this is something that is completely alien to anything i have ever imagined let alone actually seen before.
     based on my estimate of being a 1/2 mile distance from the object when i filmed it i estimate that each of the 3 sides of the triangular guitar pick shape to be 100 feet long or longer. i estimate the thickness of the guitar pick shape to be 20 feet or more thick. i estimate the mountain peaks that sit on the guitar pick shape to be at least 20 stories (which equals 200 feet)or more high.
     i think most people would be absolutely terrified if they saw what i saw. the shape of the craft is not like a nice uniform smooth saucer shape or sphere that you can easily remember or relate to when thinking about it. this craft instead is extremely complicated and not easily recalled in detail when thinking about it. unless you sit and study the video for a long period of time and commit the shape to memory it is a very hard configuration to remember in detail. overall it is not like where you see something smooth and uniform and pretty like a saucer and say "omg - look at that" and stand there and watch it and film it. i think if most people saw the object i am talking about in real life they would run away in complete fear and not bother about the camera shot. i have shown my films to a few people and the reaction is the same - shock and fear mostly because they have nothing in their backgrounds to refer to when looking at this craft. it is literally new and strange territory and for the most part most people do not like new and strange territories.
      as mentioned i have been studying this craft for five months both close up and from a distance and i have never once got a feeling of fear or a feeling that i was being threatened in any way from it. i have no idea what it is doing night after night but one thing i know for sure - whoever built this technology could easily take over our planet and they have not done it yet. the craft inspires in me a feeling of wonderment and curiosity - not fear or apprehension. it makes me want to learn more about it - not run from it.
     i have 10 video clips of the craft showing it both cruising above my area and up close with really amazing detail. before i send any of them i would like a representative of mufon to contact me. 
     there is one thing about this case that is completely different from any other reported incident submitted to mufon or perhaps even in the history of ufology - i can show you a ufo that you can see, film and study every night of the week up close and personal. this is something the world should know about.  
     please contact me - thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This is a ufo i have filmed 10 times & comes to my area every night of the week since june - 2014

content.detailedDescription:
I hope i'm not completely wasting your time, i take this sort of thing very seriously and scientifically and have the same ambitions your organization does. this event did not personally happen to me in any way, but before you flip to the next report, just bear with me for a moment and continue reading - i just simply have lived in the area of dover and have heard a lot about the dover demon case that occurred back in 1977, and vividly remember the description the witnesses gave and pictures they drew. i know this incident was not in any way a ufo case - but the bizarre entity seen that night seems to me to be remarkably consistent in behavior and appearance to the more recent case in varginha, brazil in 1996 which you of course have a case file on. 

what i'm writing to you about is that i don't know if you're particularly aware of the dover demon case since it didn't involve any ufo's and considering how many reports you get, you could easily have overlooked or simply not known about the extreme similarities between the entities described in these 2 incidents. i have no idea if there is any connection to the same type of creature or even if it is if that helps you in any way. 

but just, just in case somehow this could be a remarkable similarity in the sighting of an entity which might help you to come up with a theory of a type of classification or species of alien which could lend credibility to other sightings of very similarly described entities in the future, i wanted to make sure you're aware of it. 

it's a well known case more in the cryptozoology area than ufo research, but i always believed it to have been an alien and not an earthly inhabitant. you can find plenty of information on it and i know the people who originally witnessed it, though their names are available all over the internet as well, and i didn't speak to them before writing this so i won't give their names here, but like i said, easily found if you don't already have a case file on it.

alright, enough wasting your time. as said, just wanted to ensure someone at your network is aware of the striking coincidence between the description of these 2 creatures, or their description as i've been told/seen drawings from witnesses of, just in case it helps you in some way. 

thanks for the work you do. it's invaluable. literally.
content.summary: Old case commonly referred to as

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room.  a helicopter was flying low and close.  i grabbed my camera and took three pictures.  they looked like a normal blackhawk helicopter.  the helicopter was traveling from the east to the south.  a few minutes later, it came back.  i grabbed my camera, and took three more pictures.  the helicopter was flying from the south to the east, but took a sharp turn to the south-east.  the last picture i took is what made me write this report.  the helicopter was flying away from me when i took this picture, but i don't think it was one anymore.  (i'll include the second-to-last picture to compare, you can see the helicopter turning away) when i looked at the pictures, what i saw amazed me.  it didn't look like a helicopter anymore, i couldn't even identify any parts!  see what you think.  i'll include 2 pictures.  one is of the helicopter about 10 seconds before the second (weird) picture was taken.
content.summary: A blackhawk helicopter changed into an unrecognizable shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the trash out after dinner.  i looked up to gaze at the stars, and i saw the moon.  i looked, and i saw 30 fast-moving objects at a high altitude, in a perfect v formation flying from the north-west to the south-east.  i only saw them when they moved in front of the moon, revealing the formation.  this happened at about 6:50 pm eastern time. i didn't record the exact time, but this is my best guess.  

  i could only see them in front of the moon, and i lost sight of them when they left the direct light of the moon.  it lasted for only a second or two. at first, i thought is was geese, being in the fall.  however, these objects were moving too fast, and flying too high for that to be the case.

i was amazed when i first saw the objects, if only for two seconds.  after i lost sight of them, i stared in amazement.  

 if i had to guess, i would say that they were either at 20,000 feet or higher in the sky.  the individual objects were very small.  it was based on the size that i made my altitude guess. 

i love sky watching.  i've seen the iss and the space shuttle fly over my house.  if my ufo's and the shuttle were the same size, that would put the v formation well into space.
content.summary: About 25-30 objects flying in a perfect

content.detailedDescription:
Was in patrol car wynnewoood, ok i was looking to the east i saw a white
light low. it looked like a plane was going to land as it got closer i saw it was very high. the light made a high speed turn to the right or north. then you saw the flight was 6 to 10 objects flying in formation
4 in the first flight then four more then the rest of them. they looked to be in a diamond shape. the next one was also diamond shape too. the rest were on the outer ends in the center. when they made the 90% turn to the north you could see the most strangest colors i've ever seen coming from
 the rear of each one rear like con trails
 i made a report to dispatch they loged it . the next day on morning show
they said it was self powered space junk. what is that, junk with motors.
content.summary: 6 to 10 bright
